snippet: A judge set a $2 million bail for Justin Jasper, a Nevada man arrested near the University of Washington in a truck that the authorities said contained weapons.
abstract: Washington judge sets $2 million bail for Justin Jasper, who was arrested near the University of Washington in a truck that authorities say contained weapons; authorities say stolen truck also contained maps to three Seattle campuses and firebombs.
lead_paragraph: A judge set a $2 million bail for Justin Jasper, a Nevada man arrested near the University of Washington in a truck that the authorities said contained weapons.

headline.main: Washington: $2 Million Bail for Man With Guns
headline.print_headline: Washington: $2 Million Bail For Man With Guns
